update.name: Jinspector Joomla! Site Inspector
update.description:
This plugin will gather information about your Joomla! installation, trigger the Find Updates option in your Joomla! installer at a pre specified interval and email you the information.
You can specify a custom email address, or addresses or select a user group to receive notifications. The notification interval can be set in the plugin, current options are daily, weekly, two weekly, and four weekly.
